class.name: derez.libs.Magnetics
class.comment: MagneticData provides information about the magnetic parameters in a location defined by its Latitude, Longitude and Altitude coordinates.

method.name: SetDate
method.comment: The library is taking today's date as a default. If you need calculation for another date - use this method.

method.name: MagneticData
method.comment: Lat and LON are in degrees, East and North positive. Alt in Km above sea level or the WGS84 ellipsoid. The method returns an array of three parameters: -Magnetic Declination (or Variation) -Magnetic Inclination -Grid Variation - for Lat above 55 degrees or below -55 degrees. For other cases it returns -999.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object by reading parameters from a file. Do not supply File.DirAssets, If the file is provided in this directory, copy it prior to initialization to another place (for example- File.dirInternal) and then provide this directory in the initialization parameter. The file is valid for the period 2015 - 2022. For later use a new file should be prepared from data found in this site: http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/geomag/WMM/soft.shtml , where the algorithm is taken from.
